com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup

类 AylaBLESetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaBLESetup

  • public class AylaBLESetup
extends java.lang.Object
    AylaBLESetup class is used to scan for devices with BLE-Wifi combo modules. This class has public methods to scan for BLE modules supporting Ayla GATT service, connect to a selected device, and read and write BLE characteristics to connect the device to Ayla cloud. Once a BLE device has been discovered via a call to scanDevices(int, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.ble.AylaBLEDeviceManager.ScanFilter, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaBLESetupDevice[]>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener), the selected device can be passed to connectToBLEDevice(com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaBLESetupDevice, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener) to connect the mobile device to the BLE device. Once the mobile and device are connected through BLE, the mobile device asks the setup device to do its own scan for access points via scanForAccessPoints(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener), and fetches the scan results using fetchScanResults(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaWifiScanResults>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener) If the device supports Setup Token characteristic, the app calls sendSetupToken(java.lang.String, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener) to send a setup token to the device. This setup token will be used later in the setup process to confirm that the device connected to Ayla cloud.

    At this point the user may choose an access point for the device to connect to and supply the app with the WiFi password. Once this is done, a call to connectDeviceToAP(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaSetup.WifiSecurityType, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener) will start connecting the device to the selected AP.

    In order to confirm that the device has successfully connected to the WiFi network, and subsequently the Ayla service, the confirmDeviceConnected(int, java.lang.String, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaBLESetupDevice>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener) method can be called to verify that the device has connected.

    Once the device has been connected to the network, it may be registered to the user's account if it was not already registered.

    • 字段详细资料

      • SETUP_REQUIRED_PERMISSIONS

        public static final java.lang.String[] SETUP_REQUIRED_PERMISSIONS
        Array of permissions required by setup. Methods will check these to make sure they have been permitted before proceeding.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AylaBLESetup

        public AylaBLESetup(@NonNull
                    android.content.Context context,
                    @NonNull
                    AylaSessionManager sessionManager)
             throws AylaError
        Constructor
        参数:
        context - Context to be used.
        sessionManager - SessionManager for the current session to be passed from the app.
        抛出:
        PreconditionError - if sessionManager is null or AylaError if required permissions for setup are not granted.
        AylaError

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSetupDevice

        public AylaBLESetupDevice getSetupDevice()
        Returns AylaBLESetupDevice instance used for setup
        返回:
        BLE setup device

      • getConfirmPollInterval

        public int getConfirmPollInterval()
        Returns the poll interval used when polling the service to determine if a device has connected to the service
        返回:
        the poll interval in ms

      • setConfirmPollInterval

        public void setConfirmPollInterval(int timeInMs)
        Sets the interval used to poll the device service to determine if the device has successfully connected to the service after joining the WiFi network.
        参数:
        timeInMs - Time in milliseconds between requests to look for the device

      • addListener

        public void addListener(AylaBLESetup.DeviceErrorCodeChangeListener listener)
        Adds the listener to be notified of device wifi setup error code changes.
        参数:
        listener - Listener to be notified

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(AylaBLESetup.DeviceErrorCodeChangeListener listener)
        Removes the listener that that was added to get wifi setup error code from the device.
        参数:
        listener - Listener to be removed

      • scanDevices

        public AylaAPIRequest scanDevices(int timeout,
                                  AylaBLEDeviceManager.ScanFilter scanFilter,
                                  com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaBLESetupDevice[]> successListener,
                                  ErrorListener errorListener)
        Scan for available BLE devices.
        参数:
        timeout - Maximum time the search should take in ms.
        scanFilter - used to filter the set of returned devices.
        successListener - Listener to be notified with the results.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • connectToBLEDevice

        public AylaAPIRequest connectToBLEDevice(AylaBLESetupDevice setupDevice,
                                         com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                         ErrorListener errorListener)
        Connect to a BLE device that is to be connected to a Wifi access point.
        参数:
        setupDevice - AylaBLESetupDevice that is to be connected to Wifi access point.
        successListener - Listener to be notified with results.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • scanForAccessPoints

        public AylaAPIRequest scanForAccessPoints(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                          ErrorListener errorListener)
        Starts a wifi scan on the device for Wifi access points.
        参数:
        successListener - Listener to be notified if scan was started.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • fetchScanResults

        public AylaAPIRequest fetchScanResults(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaWifiScanResults> successListener,
                                       ErrorListener errorListener)
        Fetch wifi scan results from the device.
        参数:
        successListener - Listener to be notified with results.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • sendSetupToken

        public AylaAPIRequest sendSetupToken(java.lang.String setupToken,
                                     com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                     ErrorListener errorListener)
        Sends setup token to the device by writing to Setup Token characteristic. Setup Token is a characteristic in Ayla Connectivity GATT Service. The value written to Setup Token characteristic will be used to confirm that the device connected to Ayla cloud.
        参数:
        setupToken - setup token to be sent to device.
        successListener - Listener to be notified if request was successful.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        camcelable AylaAPIRequest

      • connectDeviceToAP

        public AylaAPIRequest connectDeviceToAP(java.lang.String ssid,
                                        java.lang.String password,
                                        AylaSetup.WifiSecurityType securityType,
                                        com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                        ErrorListener errorListener)
        Connects device to selectes Wifi sccess point.
        参数:
        ssid - SSID of the access point to connect the device to.
        password - password for the access point.
        successListener - Listener to be notified with results.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • confirmDeviceConnected

        public AylaAPIRequest confirmDeviceConnected(int timeoutInSeconds,
                                             java.lang.String setupToken,
                                             com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaBLESetupDevice> successListener,
                                             ErrorListener errorListener)
        Confirms that the setup device has connected to the Ayla service. The mobile device needs to be able to reach the Device service in order for this call to succeed.
        参数:
        timeoutInSeconds - Timeout for this operation.
        setupToken - Value written to Setup Token characteristic during setup
        successListener - Listener called when the device has been confirmed to connect to the service. The listener will be called with an AylaBLESetupDevice containing at least the LAN IP address, device type, registration type and time the device connected.
        errorListener - Listener called if an error occurs or the operation times out.
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest for this request
